A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I went into this film with an attitude that perhaps the owners of the franchise were bleeding the public dry what with the regular films and these new spin off films.
The saga continues from the events of the last film and without entering into any plot specifics I can safely say that my negative attitudes were allayed.
The casting has been one of the strengths of these films and so it continues.
A new director Rian Johnson is behind proceedings and perhaps his inclusion brings freshness to familiar faces and events.
The film does drag on perhaps twenty minutes or so to long in my opinion. I have a new bladder test when it comes to films over two hours!
The CGI in the film is used sensibly. Some great location photography is included. (Not in outer space).
All in all a solid entry in perhaps a formulaic series now?
